summary: The slightly fictionalized story of an art forger, a journalist desperate for a big story, and the biggest press scandal in German history: the Hitler Diaries.
cast: Götz George|Uwe Ochsenknecht|Christiane Hörbiger|Rolf Hoppe|Dagmar Manzel|Veronica Ferres|Ulrich Mühe|Martin Benrath|Hermann Lause|Karl Schönböck|Rosemarie Fendel|Georg Marischka|Thomas Holtzmann|Hark Bohm|Willy Harlander|Hans-Joachim Hegewald|Peter Roggisch|Armin Rohde|Günter Junghans|Robert Chalkey|Thomas Tipton|Harald Maack|Helge Fischer|Wolfgang Menge|Fritz Lichtenhahn|Eva Maria Kerkhoff|Jan Koester|Mircea Crisan|Thomas Wüpper|Michael Kessler|Martin Feifel|Günther Bader|Beate Loibl|Harald Juhnke|Donald Arthur|Jim Boeven|Gerd Heidemann|Konrad Kujau|Andreas Lukoschik
title: Schtonk
